name: The Trapdoor
description:
by cjbarron 

Enter dungeon after dungeon through The Trapdoor in this simple roguelite. Descend the levels through the labyrinths of rooms and corridors,  avoid the traps and kill the dungeon trolls to progress. How long can you survive?

Developed by cjbarron (https://cjbarron.itch.io/) in collaboration with: 

https://ryan-higgins.itch.io/ 

https://supertigerface.itch.io/
